description._content: Title: The Atlantic 2647, Boulogne Port Creator: Unknown Date: ca. 1913-1918 Place: Boulogne, France Part Of: David Goodyear collection of foreign railroad photographs Description: This photograph shows the steam locomotive Atlantic 2647 on the right. On the left is No. 3.1157, one of the first series of pacifics introduced onto the Nord in 1912. Both locomotives have standard six-wheel Nord tenders. Source: Collyns, Adrian H. Northern Steam Vapeurs du Nord. DeGolyer Library, Southern Methodist University, 2003. Physical Description: 1 photograph: black and white; 12 x 21 cm. File: ag1983_0266_24_01_06r_atlantic_sm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/u?/rwy,705 View Railroads: Photographs, Manuscripts, and Imprints digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/rwy
